title: Sex, Money and Where To Put It: Helping You Reach Your Financial Climax
description: WARNING! This book contains crude humor and sexual innuendos about money. If you have a P or a V, then you can definitely relate to this majestic piece of art. Isn't it about time you grabbed your personal finances by the balls? Every adult could benefit from sex tips, money tips, and just the tip, so it's basically a no-brainer to have a threesome with these topics. Get ready to learn finance in a captivating new way! 'Sex, Money and Where To Put It' is a must read that combines Kama Sutra with personal finance. Because nothing shouts financial freedom quite like Sex and Money. You're welcome, America. 12x #1 ebook on Amazon (4x #1 Best Seller and 8x #1 New Release)!!
author: Kitty Liquor
